fear.title: beer
fear.description: An empty can of Coors Light
fear.memory: I received you in 2017, just last year, at my first NYC gay pride march. I’ve attained numerous gay flags in various forms, but you are special. I vividly remember hopping over the metal barriers separating patrons and marchers. As police officers watched, I alongside many of my friends stomped on the pavement head held high. I have never felt so liberated in my entire life. I felt so much power at that moment
